meanings.definition: In a very careful and thorough way
meanings.sent1: She scrupulously checked her work for any mistakes before submitting it.
meanings.sent2: He always scrupulously follows the rules when playing games.
meanings.sent3: The detective scrupulously examined every clue to solve the mystery.
meanings.sent4: The artist scrupulously blended colors to create a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The scientist scrupulously recorded every detail of the experiment for accuracy.

meanings.sent1: The tailor scrupulously measured the fabric before cutting it.

meanings.sent3: The chef scrupulously garnished each dish with precision.
meanings.sent4: The architect scrupulously designed every corner of the building.
meanings.sent5: The teacher scrupulously reviewed each student's assignment for errors.

meanings.sent2: She scrupulously cared for the plants in her garden.
